<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Provides a Redshift event subscription resource.


## Attributes

The following additional atttributes are provided:

* `arn` - Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Redshift event notification subscription
* `id` - The name of the Redshift event notification subscription
* `customer_aws_id` - The AWS customer account associated with the Redshift event notification subscription

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_aws as aws

default_cluster = aws.redshift.Cluster("defaultCluster",
    cluster_identifier="default",
    database_name="default")
default_topic = aws.sns.Topic("defaultTopic")
default_event_subscription = aws.redshift.EventSubscription("defaultEventSubscription",
    event_categories=[
        "configuration",
        "management",
        "monitoring",
        "security",
    ],
    severity="INFO",
    sns_topic_arn=default_topic.arn,
    source_ids=[default_cluster.id],
    source_type="cluster",
    tags={
        "Name": "default",
    })
```
{{% /example %}}

{{% example typescript %}}
```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const defaultCluster = new aws.redshift.Cluster("default", {
    clusterIdentifier: "default",
    databaseName: "default",
});
const defaultTopic = new aws.sns.Topic("default", {});
const defaultEventSubscription = new aws.redshift.EventSubscription("default", {
    eventCategories: [
        "configuration",
        "management",
        "monitoring",
        "security",
    ],
    severity: "INFO",
    snsTopicArn: defaultTopic.arn,
    sourceIds: [defaultCluster.id],
    sourceType: "cluster",
    tags: {
        Name: "default",
    },
});
```
{{% /example %}}

</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a source_type must also be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sourcetype~csharp">
<span class="nx">
Source<wbr>Type
<a class="anchorjs-link " href="#sourcetype~csharp" aria-label="Anchor" data-anchorjs-icon="" style="font: 1em / 1 anchorjs-icons;padding-left: 0.375em;"></a>
</span>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `cluster`, `cluster-parameter-group`, `cluster-security-group`, or `cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"

    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of event categories for a SourceType that you want to subscribe to. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/mgmt/working-with-event-notifications.html or run `aws redshift describe-event-categories`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="name~nodejs">
<span class="nx">
name

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the Redshift event subscription.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="severity~nodejs">
<span class="nx">
severity
<a class="anchorjs-link " href="#severity~nodejs" aria-label="Anchor" data-anchorjs-icon="" style="font: 1em / 1 anchorjs-icons;padding-left: 0.375em;"></a>
</span>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The event severity to be published by the notification subscription. Valid options are `INFO` or `ERROR`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a source_type must also be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `cluster`, `cluster-parameter-group`, `cluster-security-group`, or `cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

        <span>opts</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}

<span class="nx">
Event<wbr>Categories

            title="Optional">

Severity

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of identifiers of the event sources for which events will be returned. If not specified, then all sources are included in the response. If specified, a source_type must also be specified.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourcetype~csharp">
<span class="nx">
Source<wbr>Type
<a class="anchorjs-link " href="#state_sourcetype~csharp" aria-label="Anchor" data-anchorjs-icon="" style="font: 1em / 1 anchorjs-icons;padding-left: 0.375em;"></a>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of source that will be generating the events. Valid options are `cluster`, `cluster-parameter-group`, `cluster-security-group`, or `cluster-snapshot`. If not set, all sources will be subscribed to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dd>{{% md %}}A map of tags to assign to the resource.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
